      • isValid

        public boolean isValid(GameManager gameManager,
                       Player player)
        checks if the current powerUp can be used or not in a specific situation it checks ammos, if the player has the selected powerUp and if he is in the right state
        Parameters:
        gameManager - the current game
        player - the players that's trying to use the powerUp
        Returns:
        true if it can be used, false otherwise

      • payCost

        public void payCost(GameManager gameManager,
                    Player currentPlayer)
        starting method of the powerUp execution. It makes the player pay the cost of the PowerUp or makes him discard a powerUp if he wants to
        Parameters:
        gameManager -
        currentPlayer - the player that is playing the powerUp

        Returns:

        Throws:

      • startEffect

        public void startEffect(GameManager gameManager,
                        Player currentPlayer)
        method called after having paid the cost. It checks all the possible cases in all different usages
        Parameters:
        gameManager -
        currentPlayer - the player that's using the powerUp

      • afterExecution

        public void afterExecution(GameManager gameManager,
                           Player player)
        method call at the end of the powerUp execution. It uses the turnStateHandler to handle with the turnstates of all the players
        Parameters:
        gameManager -
        player - the player that has used the powerUp
